meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pasty.
meanings.sent1: Her face had a noticeable pastiness, making her look unwell.
meanings.sent2: The pastiness of the dough made it difficult to roll out.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the clown's makeup gave him a comical pastiness.
meanings.sent4: The pastiness of the wall paint reminded her of a thick layer of frosting.
meanings.sent5: The pastiness of the glue made it stick instantly.

meanings.sent1: The doctor noted the pastiness of the patient's skin as a sign of illness.
meanings.sent2: Her pastiness was a stark contrast to her sister's sun-kissed glow.
meanings.sent3: Despite using bronzer, her pastiness still showed through.
meanings.sent4: The pastiness of the vampire's skin was a clear indicator of his supernatural nature.
meanings.sent5: The pastiness of the ghostly figure sent shivers down their spines.

meanings.sent1: The pastiness of the mud made it hard to walk through the field.
meanings.sent2: The pastiness of the glue caused it to adhere quickly.
meanings.sent3: The pastiness of the oatmeal made it difficult to swallow.
meanings.sent4: The pastiness of the batter made it perfect for frying.
